entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SuperPMI collection: add per-command timeout option #66966
    Future
  • `System.Reflection.Metadata` cannot parse an assembly created by `ILASM` #66957
  • [Crossgen2 composite / windows / x64] Race condition in ZapSig::DecodeModuleFromIndex in random tests #66954
    7.0.0
  • NullTargetBlock never Completes #66953
  • JsonNode/JsonObject not differentiating between missing property and null-value #66948
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols LdapConnection doesn't work with Ntlm and Kerberos on Linux #66945
  • HttpConnectionPool should aggressively open multiple HTTP/2 connections under load if EnableMultipleHttp2Connections is set #66944
  • Alternative option to Thread.Abort() #66943
  • Cannot get Total CPU Usage or Idle with System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses #66942
  • Environment.OSVersion.Platform Returns Unix NOT MacOSX #66940
  • Internal Error: "Unable to start test host", - in Visual Studio for Mac #66938
  • [API Proposal]: Unbox as Span<byte> #66934
  • [API Proposal]: TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #66928
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration #66927
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector128\\Fma_r\\Fma_r.cmd #66926
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_58827\\Runtime_58827\\Runtime_58827.cmd #66925
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Devirtualization/structreturningstruct/structreturningstruct.sh #66924
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/tailrecursetry2/tailrecursetry2.sh #66923
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\BenchmarksGame\\regex-redux\\regex-redux-1\\regex-redux-1.cmd #66922
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #66921
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/flowgraph/dev10_bug679008/ehDescriptorPtrUpdate/ehDescriptorPtrUpdate.sh #66920
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\TieredCompilation\\BasicTestWithMcj\\BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #66917
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\NativeClients\\Dispatch\\Dispatch.cmd #66916
  • Fails on non-ascii path #66913
    7.0.0

Closed

  • DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts=/mypath/myfile.socket does not work #66263
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Buffers.Text.Base64Url #66841
  • System.Collections.Immutable.Tests on Wasm failing intermittently with Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:1990, condition `<disabled>' not met #65574
  • [WASM] Workloads-.BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests failed on Build Browser wasm Linux Release WasmBuildTests sporadically #66591
  • gc-standalone: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfig/TestConfig.sh [FAIL] #66905
    7.0.0
  • Move name resolution cancellation test into Docker #43816
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M12-Beta2\\b52838\\b52838\\b52838.cmd #66919
  • DllNotFoundException error message doesn't account for musl libc #12577
    Future
  • Recommended way of exposing C++ data and interfaces to .NET core #23743
    Future
  • Support for Mono's DllImport(@"__Internal") ? #7267
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide an API to get the native module handle of the native process entry-point module #56331
    7.0.0
  • area-Extensions-DependencyInjection：Problems encountered using DependencyInjection #66809
  • Handling certain special signals properly is impossible with `PosixSignalRegistration` #62706
  • Cannot invoke `pthread_jit_write_protect_np` #64880
  • TrimEnd works strangely #66909
  • [wasm] Interpreter: Local variable of function pointer type emits a warning `Test.Prepare: Store local stack type mismatch 0 7` #65881
    7.0.0
  • MacOs: Directory(path).GetParent(), Directory.GetParent(path) #66939
  • Please release a new stable 6.x version of the System.Runtime.Experimental package #66884
  • system.io.pipelines sample that shows server responding to data that client is sending #61060

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some alloc-dealloc mismatches found by ASAN #66964
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update `main` branding to `preview4` #66962
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Improve nullable annotations for `ILogger.BeginScope` #66960
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • remove unused code #66959
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Only run loc build for official builds #66956
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • prevent BaseType from returning default #66955
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add validation target to avoid losing test coverage with merged test wrappers #66951
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove OfType/ToArray usage from ReflectTypeDescriptionProvider #66949
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [mono][interp] Enable some tests #66947
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Initialize offset_entries #66933
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix up DiagnosticName of RuntimeDetermined types #66937
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update to latest System.CommandLine package #66929
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bump IntelliSense package to .NET 7.0 Preview1 #66753
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix memory load ordering bug #66952
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Remove w32error code #66846
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Clear gcServer before running the scenario #66907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1674429 #66883
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Update error string for non-glibc scenarios #66950
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. (#65682)" #66946
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Podcast app repo #66843
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Cloning improvements #66257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix typo in detecting sys/auxv.h #66894
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix a few local store warnings #66766
  • Make it possible to log scanner progress #66935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add executable bit to tizen sh files #66931
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix ReplaceModuleMapping for 32bit binary on 64bit kernel #66640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ValueStringBuilder in CodeIdentifier.MakeValid #66915
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance
  • Replace XmlSchema ContentValidator Hashtables that are boxing lots of ints #66908
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance

Updated

  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix heap walking with global allocation context #66844
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • perf: Pass --dotnet-path to use dotnet-workload for wasm #66795
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that fgMorphFieldToSimdGetElement doesn't call gtNewSimdGetElementNode if the ISA is unsupported #66853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few #ifdef vs. #if issues #66898
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource` #66802
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fixes 42643 Work in Progress attempt at getting this to work - https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/42643 #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Do not set _WasmDevel=true for blazor projects #66793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Http` #66891
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource` #66892
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • [arm64] JIT: Better addressing modes around bytes #66902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove the llvmonly exception handling code, its not used any … #66875
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • feat: Add support for emscripten module exports #66868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid bool[] allocation in MemberInfoCache.PopulateProperties #66912
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Release `CordbUnmanagedThread` instance from `CordbProcess` member #66910
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove delegate/closure allocations from DynamicAssemblies.IsTypeDynamic #66797
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Opt out of sending telemetry data by default for non-Microsoft builds #24474
  • When building for MacOs on PC, give us an option to Pre-bundle #24467

Closed

  • MSBuildSdkResolver throws ArgumentException when solution path is an empty string #24320

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix help infinite loop. #24449
    Bug, Area-CLI, 6.0.3xx
  • Properly handle empty solution and project paths in SDK resolver #24333
    Area-SdkResolvers
  • [dotnet-watch] Skip Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings_WhenUsingProjectOption as it is flaky #24428

Updated

  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the missing workload message to recommend doing a restore. #24450
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1674831 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Renable the test based on feedback. #24447
  • Hide manifest updates during workload install #24451
    Area-Workloads
  • Port the prep machine change and the helix update to VS 2022 #24412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Package Validation support for cases where PackageId is different than AssemblyName #24439
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24446

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New rename dialog always renames file once checkbox is selected #60294

Closed

  • Add option to always use known symbol servers for embedded and Source Link navigation #59712
    17.2
  • Typo: "Apply namespace matches folde preferences" #60213
  • C# compiler should not produce 'CS8618 Non-nullable field must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor' warning with null check in constructor #60283
  • IDE0004 incorrectly reported when casting from nullable enum to nullable int; applying codefix results in non-compilable code #60292

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK version in docs, etc. #60299
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Change Visual Studio Cache version to stop restoring System.Text.Encodings.Web 4.6.0 #60296
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Updating our DiaSymReader.Native support #60290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Initialize MEF parts before switching to the UI thread #60289
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Edit the breaking change doc for publishing on docs #60260
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix a typo and an inconsistency #60238
    Community, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement classification for UTF8 String Literals #60265
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix issue with remove-unnecessary-cast and necessary explicit casts. #60293
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Correct change ObjectCreationExpression to ImplictObjectCreationExpression for SmartBreakline #60249
    Next
  • Add syntax normalizer tests for UTF8 String Literals. #60269
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Implement QuickInfo for UTF8 String Literals #60268
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add F1HelpTests for `checked` keyword. #60258
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check for reference assembly before deciding which language to show #60271
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't add async modifier for non-awaitable return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Update some netcore packages to 6.0.0 #58570
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve error message for unmatched override that uses 'T?' #55624
    Area-Compilers
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Backport lock contention fixes to 17.1 #60130
    Area-IDE
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cache built skeleton assemblies so they can be reused on next launch without rebuilding them. #57826
    Area-Compilers
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI th…" #60282
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No response for multipart body exceeding MaxRequestBodySize #40810
  • Optimize subsequential Blazor WASM load #40809
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery includes anchor #40806
  • Add ElementReference to InputRadioGroup & InputRadio #40804
  • Undocumented breaking change in default static asset handling .NET 6: Files in wwwroot/ no longer included as content, in publishable zip file #40803
  • Make Result types constructors public #40802
    7.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server .NET 6 No Scroll after clicking an anchor link #40800
  • Unexpected binding behavior (with addl side ?s) for Blazor docs #40798
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Authorize Attribute Error #40797
  • gRPC transcoding public API #40792

Closed

  • The config for identity isn't sync with client-side validation for password #40793
  • @Blackleones #40767
  • Failed assert for m_disconnect_cts->reset() in connection_impl::start #39730
    7.0-preview4
  • Analyzer: Warn that IResult should not be returned from Controller Actions #39692
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebHostBuilderExtensions UseStartup() uses incorrect logic to determine AssemblyName #40755
  • Response.BodyWriter.FlushAsync doesn't return canceled on HttpContext.Abort #40788
  • Provide docs on how to integrate custom msbuild target with dotnet watch and hot reload #39609
    Discussions
  • EventCallback<T> doesn't work with Generic Parameter #40801
  • DO NOT WARN : BL0005 #40685
  • Add additional overloads for RouteValueDictionary ctor #40438
    7.0-preview3
  • Make IResult methods more testable #37502
    7.0-preview4
  • `BadHttpRequestException` not caught via `UseExceptionHandler` in non-development environment #40789

PullRequests

Created

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Ignore hash when supplying querystring parameters #40808
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40807
    6.0.x

Merged

  • Enable more MSVC warnings for SDL signoff #40777
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • WPF/WinForms Blazor WebView Exception Handling #40765
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.4
  • Revert "[release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build" #40805
    6.0.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ae1b7ad` to `b007c54` #40796
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix Typo #40716
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `e2c62a7` to `930ccc7` #40466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Get richnav.yml building again #40783
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoiding `ParameterBindingMethodCache` exceptions in MVC #40738
    area-mvc
  • Change .js MIME type to text/javascript #40771
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21

Issues

Created

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActivityIndicator ignores HorizontalOptions on Windows #5480
  • Fullscreen #5478
  • No XAML Hot Reload errors or status logged #5472
  • Shell Toolbar does not always show #5470
  • After update VS 2022 android maui project not build XamlCompiler error WMC1007 #5469
  • Border control is not updated, while it's width and height changed. #5464
  • Button release outside button area. #5457

Closed

  • Remove all code calling SetupDefaults() and the related properties #3795
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • [Android] AddEmbeddedResourceFont is no longer working with Preview 14 #5456
  • MAUI: ListView throws System.InvalidCastException #5471
  • Docs: Blazor hybrid walkthrough / getting started #3684
  • MAUI Blazor app how to disable scale and F12 dev tools? #5431
  • EXE files cannot be double-clicked to run #5327
  • WebView Navigated and Navigating events do not occur #5280
  • Visual Studio is crashing sometimes when opening a solution #5473
  • Mobile workload in VS missing MSVC build tools component needed to publish .NET MAUI apps on Windows #5474
  • Display chm Content in Webview #5467
  • Push Notification for MAUI #5458
  • Wrapping Layout in a `Frame` breaks controls #5365
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Spec] Switch out Renderers based on IVER to Renderers based on IVEH #4095
  • Shell No longer displays correctly in Preview 14 on IPad #5396
  • Validate correct target for XAML/CSS injection and platform folder adjustments #4431
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Create installable artifacts for Blazor hybrid desktop apps for Windows and macOS #2534
  • [Bug] Occasionally Maui Repository fails to compile because staticwebassets.pack.sentinel file can't be written to #2955
    .NET 7
  • [Paper cut] Load local HTML file with WebView #5098
  • Docs: How to debug Blazor hybrid apps #3685
    6.0.300
  • WinUI Resources XAML - Evaluate/Remove unneeded styles #5150
  • Fix LoadedFiresOnPushedPage on iOS and Windows #5177
  • [Android[ Delay loading of Flyout content on Shell until the user opens the Flyout #5178
  • VS2022 Version 17.2.0 Preview 2.0 Unable to pair to Mac #5354
  • resizing Window breaks `Frame.CornerRadius` #5366
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Entrybox as Password=True writes wrong way #5412
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • How to implement unit test project for maui class library? #2112
  • IllegalStateException when setting a shadow in a DataTemplate in a CollectionView #5402
  • Interfaced handlers and consistent mapper naming for Controls.Core Handlers #4940
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Enhancement] Provide DPI info API #1811
  • [Android, iOS, WinUI] NavigationPage.TitleView not showing #3877
  • [Bug] PickerView on Catalyst needs more thought #1960
  • Switch does not update when setting IsToggled from code #5226
  • Entry TextColor and BackgroundColor set through attached behaviour not updating on Windows #5281
  • SwipeView throws Java.Lang.IllegalStateException:'Layout state should be one of 100 but it is 10' when in RefreshView #4529
  • Linked label clearing on update #5140
  • Native library interop on iOS #4569
  • RefreshView causes NullReferenceException with Shell template #4287
  • Touch does not pass to parent when it child is scroll view #3561
  • Preprocessors don't seem to work the same #5455
  • [Android] AppShell navigation - Table View - Java.Lang.IllegalStateException #4307
  • Title Bar Oddities on Windows #5453
  • Properties folder doesn't show up in the .NET MAUI Blazor template #4641

PullRequests

Created

  • Slider: use default styles on WinUI 3 #5479
  • Fix the layout computation for the SwipeItems #5477
  • [macCatalyst] Fix DateTime and Time pickers on the mac #5475
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • When swapping out root page on window remove toolbar #5466
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Fix clipping issues #5465
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Housekeeping] Updated Gallery to verify Slider Maximum value can be updated #5463
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix SearchBar TextChanged event not working issue #5462
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Update Gallery animation samples #5461
    area/animation 🎬, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove SetupDefaults #5317
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [android] fix EmbeddedResource fonts #5476
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Mark renderers and related base classes as obsolete #5322
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [android] port bottomtablayout.axml to Java #5424
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix removed code #5468
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix up the Samples/Tests after #5333 #5434
  • Clean up flow direction tests for Layouts on Windows #5406
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Anndroid] Fix crash using Shadows with CollectionView items #5416
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Move `WeakEventManager` to `Core.csproj` #5139
    area/architecture, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix usage of pickers on the Mac #5404
    area/desktop 🖥️, control-picker, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows] WebView not loading HtmlWebViewSource #5131
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement Path RenderTransform property #5190
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Notify ISwitch.IsOn property changes if IsToggled changed #5276
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating dynamically Entry TextColor #5282
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Updated HotReload, so it now listens to the MetadataUpdateHandler #5318
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Fixed rename of SetOnAppTheme -> SetAppTheme #5390
  • BackButtonBehavior WinUI Fixes #5391
    area/shell 🐢
  • Update WinUI secret dependencies #5432
  • Fix 'Properties' folder visibility in the .NET MAUI Blazor template #5405

Updated

  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767

  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791

  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ef-core tool 7.0.0-preview.2.22153.1 command 'dbcontext optimize' creates product version '7.0.0-preview.1.22076.6' annotation #27682
  • Microbenchmark perf regression in update benchmarks #27681
  • How to get Point-Read with EF Core 6.0 & CosmosDB, Find & FindAsync methods #27679
  • Including a related entity B inside query for A results in unpredictable state of collection of B in entity C #27678
  • Updating Related Collections via Clearing and Readding #27677
  • Basic `EF.CompileAsyncQuery` Results in `System.ArgumentException`: 'Argument types do not match' #27674
  • `EF.Property` is not working in `.Include`. Is it a bug or intended? #27672

Closed

  • Migration from old Entity Framework, one complex request not execute properly #27649

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.26.0 to 3.26.1 #27680
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
  • Add TPC support for migrations #27665

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installing with Homebrew with Defender installed fails #13421
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #13447

PullRequests

Merged

  • Refactor build.sh to optimize PackageVersions.props retrieval #13443
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13445

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add the Red Hat test suite as a smoke test for source-build #13418
  • Add SDL checks #13448
